data.title: The Greatest Brazilian Fashion
data.meta_description: The World would have been much poorer without these famous Brazilian Fashion!
data.text:
1

Adriana Lima

(Brazilian Model Who was Named the 'Most Valuable Victoria's Secret Angel' in 2017)

63

8

Birthdate: June 12, 1981

Sun Sign: Gemini

Birthplace: Salvador, Bahia, Brazil

Adriana Lima is a Brazilian model who became famous as a Victoria's Secret Angel. One of the longest-running Victoria's Secret Angels of all time, Lima was adjudged the most valuable Angel in 2017. Since 2003, she has been serving as a spokesmodel for Maybelline cosmetics. One of the world's highest-paid models, Adriana Lima is also known for her charity work.

2

Gisele Bündchen

(One of the Highest-Paid Models in the World)

25

18

Birthdate: July 20, 1980

Sun Sign: Cancer

Birthplace: Horizontina, State of Rio Grande do Sul, Brazil

Regarded as the epitome of supermodel, Gisele Bündchen is credited with bringing an end to the heroin chic era of modeling and ushering in a healthy look with curves. She pioneered and popularized the horse walk and is considered the only remaining supermodel.

3

Camila Alves

(Brazilian Model, Designer and Wife of American Actor Matthew McConaughey)

30

20

Birthdate: January 28, 1982

Sun Sign: Aquarius

Birthplace: Itambacuri, State of Minas Gerais, Brazil

Camila Alves’s rags-to-riches story is an inspiration to many. The Brazilian beauty went from being a waitress to the brand ambassador of a Macy’s collection. She designs the Muxo brand of bags and has also dabbled in hosting, lifestyle blogging, and entrepreneurship. Camila is also known as Matthew McConaughey’s wife.

Recommended Lists:

4

Lais Ribeiro

(Brazilian Model Known for Her Work as a 'Victoria’s Secret Angel')

18

3

Birthdate: October 5, 1989

Sun Sign: Libra

Birthplace: Teresina, Brazil

Lais Ribeiro is a Brazilian model. She gained international fame when she was selected to work as a Victoria's Secret Angel. She initially received training to become a nurse. However, on the advice of a friend, she took up modeling gigs and soon found success. She has appeared in advertising campaigns for Ralph Lauren, Christian Dior, and Tom Ford.

5

Ana Beatriz Barros

(Brazilian Model Known for Her Multiple Appearances in the 'Sports Illustrated Swimsuit Issue')

11

4

Birthdate: May 29, 1982

Sun Sign: Gemini

Birthplace: Itabira, State of Minas Gerais, Brazil

Ana Beatriz Barros is a Brazilian model best known for featuring on the Sports Illustrated Swimsuit Issue on multiple occasions. She is also renowned for her work with popular brands like Victoria's Secret, Chanel, Intimissimi, and Bebe. A popular model, Ana Beatriz Barros has also been featured on the covers of numerous magazines like Glamour, Vogue, Elle, and Marie Claire.

6

Francisco Lachowski

(Model)

13

3

Birthdate: May 13, 1991

Sun Sign: Taurus

Birthplace: Curitiba, Paraná, Brazil

While Vogue described him as an übermodel, GQ Portugal awarded Francisco Lachowski the International Male Model award in 2018. The Brazilian model, who has gained fans with his boyish good looks and has campaigned for top-notch brands such as Gucci and Armani, is now a father of two.

7

Izabel Goulart

(Brazilian Fashion Model Best Known for Her Work in 'Victoria’s Secret Angels' (2005 - 2008))

14

5

Birthdate: October 23, 1984

Sun Sign: Libra

Birthplace: São Carlos, São Paulo, Brazil

Izabel Goulart is a Brazilian fashion model best known for her stint as a Victoria's Secret Angel. She has also been featured in the Sports Illustrated Swimsuit Issue. She began modeling as a teenager and has modeled collections of top designers like designers such as Alberta Ferretti, Bill Blass, and Balenciaga. She is also involved in charitable work.

8

Isabeli Fontana

(Brazilian Model Known for Her Work With 'Victoria’s Secret')

12

3

Birthdate: July 4, 1983

Sun Sign: Cancer

Birthplace: Curitiba, Paraná, Brazil

Brazilian model Isabeli Fontana was in her teens when she became a Victoria’s Secret model in 1999, in a rare breach of the company’s policy of hiring models aged 21 or more. Apart from modeling for iconic brands such as Chanel and Armani, she has also appeared in magazines such as Vogue.

9

Nathalia Kaur

(Model and Actress who works in Indian cinema)

1

0

Birthdate: August 15, 1990

Sun Sign: Leo

Birthplace: Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

Brazilian-born Indian-origin model Nathalia Kaur initially studied law but later quit academics to concentrate on her modeling career. She is also known to be an opera singer and has appeared in a few Hindi films, too, such as Department. She was also part of Fear Factor: Khatron Ke Khiladi.

10

Giselli Monteiro

11

3

Brazilian-born Giselli Monteiro began her modeling career at age 17 and ended up in Bollywood after touring the world as a model. She stunned audiences with her role of a docile Indian girl in the Hindi movie Love Aaj Kal. She later quit her career to study architecture.

11

Susana Werner

(Brazilian Model and Actress)

9

3

Birthdate: July 20, 1977

Sun Sign: Cancer

Birthplace: Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

Susana Werner is a Brazilian actress and model. She is best known for her performance on TV shows and telenovelas. Susana Werner made headlines in 2002 when she married the popular Brazilian football player Júlio César. She was in a relationship with Ronaldo for two years before marrying Júlio César.

12

Giovanna Antonelli

(Actress)

10

2

Birthdate: March 18, 1976

Sun Sign: Pisces

Birthplace: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

Giovanna Antonelli is a Brazilian actress, producer, and TV host. One of the most popular and critically acclaimed actresses, Antonelli has been active in all three major mediums of acting. Over the course of her illustrious acting career, Giovanna Antonelli has won several prestigious awards such as Prêmio Qualidade Brasil, Meus Prêmios Nick, and Prêmio Quem de Televisão.

13

Alice Dellal

(Model)

9

3

Birthdate: July 29, 1987

Sun Sign: Leo

Birthplace: Brazil

The daughter of Brazilian model Andrea Dellal and Iraqi-British-born property magnate Guy Dellal, Alice Dellal soared to fame modeling for Mango and later also represented Chanel. She has appeared in a few movies such as Absolutely Fabulous: The Movie and has been a drummer for the band Thrush Metal.

14

Ana Carolina Reston

(Brazilian Model)

9

4

Birthdate: June 4, 1985

Sun Sign: Gemini

Birthplace: Jundiaí, São Paulo, Brazil

Died: November 15, 2006

Ana Carolina Reston was a Brazilian model best remembered for her work with popular brands like Giorgio Armani. Reston succumbed to the unfair demands of the fashion industry and suffered from severe anorexia nervosa and bulimia nervosa. She died at the age of 21 and weighed just 40 kgs at the time of her death.

15

Priscilla Meirelles

(Brazilian Model, Miss Earth 2004 and Miss Globe 2003)

9

2

Birthdate: September 5, 1983

Sun Sign: Virgo

Birthplace: Belém, State of Pará, Brazil

Priscilla Meirelles is a Brazilian model, environmentalist, host, actress, and beauty queen. She achieved popularity in 2003 when she won the Miss Globe pageant. The following year, she also won the Miss Earth pageant which was held in the Philippines. As an environmentalist, Meirelles has been associated with the Miss Earth pageant since 2003, co-hosting the show on numerous ocassions.

16

Fernanda Tavares

(Model)

5

1

Birthdate: September 22, 1980

Sun Sign: Virgo

Birthplace: Natal, Rio Grande do Norte, Brazil

Fernanda Tavares is a Brazilian model who has been appearing on the covers of famous magazines like Marie Claire and Vogue since the age of 17. She has also been featured on other popular magazines like Elle and the Sports Illustrated Swimsuit Issue. She has also walked the runway for famous designers like Emanuel Ungaro, John Galliano, and Salvatore Ferragamo.

17

Daniella Cicarelli

(Brazilian Former Model and TV Show Hostess for MTV Brasil’s 'Beija Sapo')

8

3

Birthdate: November 6, 1978

Sun Sign: Scorpio

Birthplace: Belo Horizonte, Minas Gerais, Brazil

Daniella Cicarelli is a Brazilian former TV show hostess and model. She is best known for her association with MTV Brasil where she hosted the famous blind-date show Beija Sapo from 2005 to 2007. Daniella Cicarelli is also known as the former fiancée of popular football player Ronaldo; she was engaged to him for three months in 2005.

18

Andressa Urach

(Brazilian Reality Television Personality)

8

3

Birthdate: October 11, 1987

Sun Sign: Libra

Birthplace: Ijuí, State of Rio Grande do Sul, Brazil

Brazilian model and TV star Andressa Urach started as a dancer and later soared to fame as the runner-up in the Miss Bumbum contest. She was once hospitalized after a botched silicone thigh implant. She claimed in a tell-all book that she once worked as a £7,000-an-hour luxury prostitute.

19

Gabriela Bertante

(Model)

9

3

Birthdate: May 7, 1989

Sun Sign: Taurus

Birthplace: Matias Barbosa, State of Minas Gerais, Brazil

Gabriela Bertante is a Brazilian former pornographic actress and trans model. She currently works in the Indian film industry and is best known for appearing in popular Indian films, such as Billa II and Devudu Chesina Manushulu.

20

Sasha Meneghel

(Brazilian Model and Actress)

1

0

Birthdate: July 28, 1998

Sun Sign: Leo

Birthplace: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

Sasha Meneghel is a Brazilian model and actress best known as the daughter of famous TV host Xuxa Meneghel and businessman Luciano Szafir. Sasha Meneghel achieved popularity minutes after her birth as the event was documented and aired on Jornal Nacional. She then started appearing on TV programs hosted by her mother and established herself as a model and actress.

21

Florinda Bolkan

(Retired Brazilian Actress and Model Known for Her Film 'Candy')

1

0

Birthdate: February 15, 1941

Sun Sign: Aquarius

Birthplace: Uruburetama, Ceará, Brazil

Height: 5'9" (175 cm)

22

Marlon Teixeira

(Model who became face of new Diesel fragrance)

1

0

Birthdate: September 16, 1991

Sun Sign: Virgo

Birthplace: Pomerode, Santa Catarina, Brazil

Marlon Teixeira is a Brazilian fashion model best known for gracing the covers of popular magazines like Client, Essential Homme, and L'Officiel Hommes. He has also walked the runway for famous designers like Jean Paul Gaultier and Roberto Cavalli. A popular model, Marlon Teixeira currently appears on Models.com's Trending Men, Sexiest Men, and Top Icons Men lists.

23

Raquel Zimmermann

(Model)

7

2

Birthdate: May 6, 1983

Sun Sign: Taurus

Birthplace: Bom Retiro do Sul

Raquel Zimmermann is a Brazilian model who has appeared in campaigns for popular brands like Dolce & Gabbana, Hugo Boss, and Versace among other international brands. She has also appeared on the cover of numerous magazines like Vogue, Harper's Bazaar, and Marie Claire. In 2011, Raquel Zimmermann was ranked 14th on models.com's Top Model Icons of All Time list.

24

Cintia Dicker

(model)

6

2

Birthdate: December 6, 1986

Sun Sign: Sagittarius

Birthplace: Campo Bom

Brazilian model and actor Cintia Dicker is one of the highest-paid models in the industry and has been part of campaigns such as Victoria's Secret. She has also graced the covers of magazines such as Marie Claire and promoted brands such as Animale’s BLU. She is known for her signature freckles.

25

Fernanda Andrade

(Actress, Model)

1

0

Birthdate: March 8, 1984

Sun Sign: Pisces

Birthplace: São José dos Campos, State of São Paulo, Brazil

Fernanda Andrade is a Brazilian-born American model and actress. She is best known for her portrayal of Isabella Rossi in the 2012 supernatural horror film The Devil Inside. Fernanda Andrade has also appeared in popular American TV series such as Next and Moon Knight.

30

Emanuela de Paula

(Brazilian Model)

6

1

Birthdate: April 25, 1989

Sun Sign: Taurus

Birthplace: Cabo de Santo Agostinho, Pernambuco, Brazil

Emanuela de Paula is a Brazilian model best known for her association with the popular UK retailer Next. She is also famous for walking the runway for world-renowned designers like Ralph Lauren, Tommy Hilfiger, and Rebecca Taylor. In 2009, Emanuela de Paula was ranked 11th on Forbes magazine's highest paid supermodels list.

31

Akihiro Sato

(Model)

1

0

Birthdate: September 12, 1983

Sun Sign: Virgo

Birthplace: São Paulo, Brazil

Japanese-Brazilian model Akihiro Sato started his career as a model in Brazil and Thailand and then emerged as one of the most popular models in the Philippines. He has also been part of the reality show Survivor Philippines: Celebrity Showdown and several other shows such as SRO Cinemaserye.

32

Yasmin Brunet

(Model, Actress)

1

0

Birthdate: June 6, 1988

Sun Sign: Gemini

Birthplace: Gávea, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

Yasmin Brunet is a Brazilian actress and model who achieved fame after featuring in the Sports Illustrated Swimsuit Issue in 2008. Apart from being a model, Yasmin Brunet is also a fierce animal rights activist. She is also working towards raising awareness about environmentalism.

33

Babi Rossi

(Brazilian Model Known for Her Performance as a 'Panicat' for the Live TV Show 'Pânico na TV')

3

1

Birthdate: February 9, 1990

Sun Sign: Aquarius

Birthplace: São Paulo, Brazil

Babi Rossi is a Brazilian TV presenter and model best known for appearing on the live comedy show Pânico na TV where she performed as a panicat. She achieved international attention in 2012 when her head was shaved in one of the episodes of the live show. Rossi has also been a popular cover girl of men's magazines like Playboy.

34

Letícia Birkheuer

(Model, Actress)

1

0

Birthdate: April 25, 1978

Sun Sign: Taurus

Birthplace: Passo Fundo, Rio Grande do Sul, Brazil

Letícia Birkheuer is a Brazilian actress and model. She achieved immense popularity in 2010 when she was featured on the cover of Brazilian Playboy. Letícia Birkheuer became a household name in Brazil when she landed the role of Érica Assumpção in the popular telenovela, Belíssima.

35

Alexandre Herchcovitch

(Fashion Designer)

1

0

Birthdate: July 21, 1971

Sun Sign: Cancer

Birthplace: State of São Paulo, Brazil

Alexandre Herchcovitch is a Brazilian fashion designer whose designs have been featured at fashion shows in London, Paris, New York, and São Paulo Fashion Weeks. Alexandre Herchcovitch is best known for his eclectic prints and avant-garde designs. In 2014, he became the first fashion designer from Brazil to be honored with the prestigious Ordem do Mérito Cultural.

36

Kana Oya

(Model & Actress)

1

0

Birthdate: November 10, 1987

Sun Sign: Scorpio

Birthplace: Belém, Pará, Brazil

Kana Oya is a Brazilian model and actress. Born to a Japanese Brazilian mother, Oya grew up in Shizuoka, Japan, where she started her modeling career at the age of 17. In addition to her modeling career, Kana Oya has also appeared in films like High & Low: The Movie where she played Sarah.

37

Vanessa Lima Vidal

(Brazilian Beauty Pageant Contestant and Beach Volleyball Player)

2

0

Birthdate: March 3, 1984

Sun Sign: Pisces

Birthplace: Fortaleza, State of Ceará, Brazil

Vanessa Lima Vidal is a Brazilian model, beach volleyball player, and beauty pageant contestant. She achieved national prominence in 2008 when she became the first deaf beauty pageant participant at the Miss Brasil pageant. Vanessa Lima Vidal also represented Brazil at the Summer Deaflympics in 2013 where she was part of the national deaf beach volleyball team.

38

Eva Andressa

(Brazilian Model and Former Bodybuilder)

1

0

Birthdate: December 19, 1984

Sun Sign: Sagittarius

Birthplace: Curitiba, State of Paraná, Brazil

Eva Andressa is a Brazilian model and former bodybuilder. After winning numerous bodybuilding competitions, Andressa chose to start a career as a fitness model which earned her immense fame. She was then featured on the covers of numerous fitness and fashion magazines. Eva Andressa's popularity increased when she started appearing on TV shows pertaining to fitness.

39

Juju Salimeni

(Model)

1

0

Birthdate: September 24, 1986

Sun Sign: Libra

Birthplace: São Paulo

Brazilian presenter, model, and social media sensation Juliana “Juju” Salimeni soared to fame as a presenter of Pânico Delivery. She was the Playboy cover girl in 2010 and is now a fitness icon and a personal trainer. She has also been associated with several samba schools.

40

Anne de Paula

(Brazilian Model)

1

0

Birthdate: March 31, 1995

Sun Sign: Aries

Birthplace: Rio de Janeiro

Anne de Paula is a Brazilian fashion model who achieved popularity in 2017 when she won the Sports Illustrated magazine's Swimsuit Model Search contest. She then went on to establish herself as a popular bikini model. Anne de Paula achieved international fame in 2018 when she started dating popular Cameroonian basketball player Joel Embiid.

41

Hermann Nicoli

(Brazilian Model)

1

0

Birthdate: July 8, 1982

Sun Sign: Cancer

Birthplace: Brazil

Hermann Nicoli is a Brazilian model and social media star. He achieved widespread popularity when he became engaged to the popular Victoria's Secret model, Candice Swanepoel. Hermann Nicoli is also known for his association with the popular modeling and talent agency, Next Model Management.
